summary: "Wicked," a book by Gregory Maguire, tells the story of the Wicked Witch of the West, named Elphaba. It's a new look at the world of "The Wizard of Oz," showing Elphaba's life from her birth to her death at Dorothy's hands. The book makes Elphaba a sympathetic character, exploring if she was born bad or if circumstances made her evil. It's the first in a series and was turned into a popular Broadway musical. Now, it's being made into a two-part movie, with the first part coming out in 2024.
title: Wicked (Maguire novel)
